# AUDIO::PREPARE_ALARM

## Summary
Prepares any banks required to play the given alarm

## Parameters
* **STRING** alarmName

## Returns
* **BOOL**: TRUE if the alarm was successfully prepared

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Example:

bool prepareAlarm = AUDIO::PREPARE_ALARM("PORT_OF_LS_HEIST_FORT_ZANCUDO_ALARMS");
Full list of alarm names by DurtyFree https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/alarmSounds.json
